about_the_game:
Tryü Sora is a heartfelt tribute to the classic arcade shooters that defined a generation. Inspired by legends like Galaga, Phoenix, Warblade and Slap Fight, it combines the timeless charm of the 80s and 90s with modern twists for an unforgettable experience.

This game isn’t just a nod to the past - it’s the game the developer always dreamed of playing. Crafted with love and attention to detail, Tryü Sora delivers addictive gameplay, stunning pixel art, and a captivating synthwave and cyberpunk soundtracks that channels the golden age of arcade gaming.

Features:

  • Hand-Crafted Campaign Mode: Designed to be learned and mastered, every level is meticulously built with unique challenges and patterns that reward skill and perseverance.

  • Flow Mode: A faster, randomized game mode perfect for quick, high-energy sessions - pure fun on demand.

  • Secrets and Achievements: Unearth hidden treasures, discover secret modules, and unlock achievements as you explore every corner of the game.

  • Power-Up and Upgrade: Equip your ship with powerful weapons and find hidden modules to gain the upper hand.

  • Diverse Game Modes: From enemy rushes and boss battles to bonus stages and debris dodging, each mode keeps the gameplay fresh and engaging.

  • Synthwave Soundtrack: Let the 80s-inspired music guide you as you soar through space and blast enemies to pieces.

The goal behind Tryü Sora was simple: to create the perfect retro-inspired game, one the developer himself would love to play. Whether you’re diving into the handcrafted campaign or chasing high scores in the fast-paced Flow Mode, this game will challenge your skills, spark your curiosity, and keep you coming back for more.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (Intel i3 or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU (Intel i5 or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with Vulkan/OpenGL 4.0 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 High Sierra or later
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-compatible GPU with OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or Apple M1/M2 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-compatible GPU (Dedicated GPU recommended)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Tryü Sora - Space Shooter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (Intel i3 or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible GPU (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU (Intel i5 or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU (NVIDIA GTX 750 or AMD equivalent)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A love letter to classic arcade shooters, Tryü Sora blends retro charm with modern gameplay. Master a handcrafted campaign, explore secrets, and dominate fast-paced modes in this addictive space adventure!
